actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Highway Improvement Act of 1982 to specifically authorize funds for access highways under section 155 of title 23, United States Code.

summary.text: Amends the Highway Improvement Act of 1982 to authorize appropriations for access highways for FY 1984 through 1986.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Highway Improvement Act of 1982 to specifically authorize funds for access highways under section 155 of title 23, United States Code.
